import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = () => { const [openDropdown, setOpenDropdown] = useState(null); return (
{/* Logo */} {/* Navigation Links */}
{/* ✅ Home */} Home {/* ✅ Job Bootcamp Dropdown */}
setOpenDropdown('bootcamp')} onMouseLeave={() => setOpenDropdown(null)} > {openDropdown === 'bootcamp' && (
Full Stack Data Science
)}
{/* ✅ Courses */} Courses {/* ✅ IIT Certifications Dropdown */}
setOpenDropdown('certification')} onMouseLeave={() => setOpenDropdown(null)} > {openDropdown === 'certification' && (
IIT Madras IIT Roorkee
)}
{/* ✅ Login */} Login
); }; export default Navbar;
